latest_revision.text:
== Office of the Champions == 
* Finding presenters
* Finding people interested in running a workshop on a technology or skill relevant to the group's interests

== Office of the Editor ==
* Finding local makers and projects to blag about
* Organizing the wiki/formatting existing pages
* Fixing spelling/grammar errors on the wiki
* Creating a sexy HSL flier (Joyce)

== Office of the Marketing Director ==
* Adding HSL events to various online calendars, including: (Joyce T - Doing)
** Make
** Eventification
** Facebook
* Customizing HSL Teitter page to match the color scheme and style of the HSL website (Nate Phillips) (David Huerta - Done)
* Modeling/photo shooting HSL merchandise (currently just the shirt) to increase interest/sales/page hits (Joyce and Zach - Done)
* Convincing Cali Lewis of GeekBrief.tv to wear an HSL shirt on her video podcast
* Getting more HSL stickers made

== Office of IT Directors ==
* Checking for incompatibilities of Wordpress plugins with the newest version of WP and removing plugins not being used (Zach - done)
* Contacting sponsors for a LAN Party
* Contributing code to the HSL Toolshare web app
* Creating a workshop-esque look-and-feel for the Toolshare DB web app (Nate Phillips)

== Office of the Treasurer ==
* Updating the fundraiser bar to reflect current donation levels.
